mainEntity.name: What services does Eaz Nexora provide?

acceptedAnswer.text: We provide website development, mobile app development, e-commerce solutions, UI/UX design, WhatsApp stores, hosting with domain, QR business cards, and ongoing maintenance & support.

mainEntity.name: How can I contact Eaz Nexora?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can reach us at +91-7039233801 or through our website contact page. We support English and Hindi.

mainEntity.name: Does Eaz Nexora offer hosting and domain services?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, we provide reliable hosting solutions along with free domain registration to get your business online quickly.

mainEntity.name: What is the cost of a website from Eaz Nexora?

acceptedAnswer.text: Our website development services start at INR 14,995. We also offer custom quotes for unique business requirements.
